sense.def: Pathological Condition of an unusual disease with sores of the size of a cherry or peach developing on the nape, displaying various colors. When these sores open the patient will lose his skin from nape to the feet. Ji feng pu ji fang 雞峰普濟方 26: 項上生瘡如櫻桃大 , 有五色。如 瘡破 , 即項皮遂斷 , 上連髮捲去 , 下至足脫之 , 乃為肉人 , “On the nape sores develop of the size of a cherry or peach. They display various colors. When they open, the skin of the nape will be cut. Above it rolls up and vanishes up to the hairline; downwards it is lost to the feet. This ends in a ‘ flesh man ’”.
